title: Transmigration: The Peasant Makeup Artist - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Disabilities   Doting Love Interests   Family Business   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Poor to Rich   Pragmatic Protagonist   Pregnancy   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
author: Yue ban yao fen jia   月半要分家
description:
Li Mo, a senior beautician from the modern era, transmigrated to the ancient period and became a peasant woman sold to a countryside man. 

Looking at the crumbling thatched house, a husband with a disabled leg, and the bony little bun, Li Mo sighed and realized she must make a fortune. >
